title: Villa for sale in Piliyandala
details:
57 perches
6 km to Piliyandala Town
Tiled floor
Maids quarters
Living, dining, modern pantry area
Kitchen with modern pantry cupboards
Pipe born water with overhead water tank & 2 wells
Remote & Roller Shutter wicket gate
Parking for 5 vehicles
Highly residential area
20-foot access road
16 Solar Panel
CCTV camera system
Modern Light System (touch switch + Sensor system)
15 x 35-foot swimming pool
50Kv Power Generator

Complete with a beautiful swimming pool and shelter rooftop terrace, this gorgeous 3 story villa has 3 spacious bedrooms and 3 bathrooms as well as parking space for up to 5 vehicles. The ambience and stylish of the home is also a great way to host short term rentals as Bolgoda is a popular tourism destination. The area is quiet but highly residential and has a safe neighborhood with abundant wildlife. The swimming pool and rooftop lounge are a great way to have friends and family over, especially considering the inviting atmosphere, the large garden is perfect for those who have children and pets to enjoy themselves. The entire house is open and airy with great ventilation, and is suitable for any family.
